description: In this course you will learn everything you need to know about Lightroom 5. This is my most complete training and includes over 6 hours of training including : Importing, organizing and exporting your photos, retouching your photos (main module), Maps, Books and Print modules, slideshows and Web Galleries. At the end of this course you will understand and use Lightroom 5 with ease. This course is intended for beginners and advanced photographers. Everything is shown on a step to step basis which makes it very easy to understand. I hope you enjoy this course !
title: Learn how to use Lightroom 5 in Photography
